query: query ($userId: UUID!, $profileId: UUID!, $memberTypeId: MemberTypeId!, $postId: UUID!) { memberType(id: $memberTypeId) { id discount postsLimitPerMonth } post(id: $postId) { id title content } user(id: $userId) { id name balance } profile(id: $profileId) { id isMale yearOfBirth } }

query ($nullUserId: UUID!, $userWithNullProfileId: UUID!, $profileId: UUID!, $postId: UUID!) { user(id: $nullUserId) { id } post(id: $postId) { id } profile(id: $profileId) { id } userWithNullProfile: user(id: $userWithNullProfileId) { id profile { id } } }
query { users { id profile { id memberType { id } } posts { id } } }
query ($userId: UUID!) { user(id: $userId) { id userSubscribedTo { id subscribedToUser { id } } subscribedToUser { id userSubscribedTo { id } } } }
